synopsis.p: Classify an alvis relation with the TEES Classifier

description.p: executes the TEES classify from and record the results in . The param sets the name of the binary rlation to predict. and and set the two roles of the relation.

param-doc.name: namedEntityLayerName
param-doc.p: Name of the layer containing the named entities

param-doc.name: neFeatureName
param-doc.p: Name of the feature to access the type of the named entities

param-doc.name: relationName
param-doc.p: Name of the relation to predict.

param-doc.name: relationRole1
param-doc.p: First role of the relation to predict

param-doc.name: relationRole2
param-doc.p: First role of the relation to predict

param-doc.name: model
param-doc.p: Path to the trained model to use.

param-doc.name: executable
param-doc.p: Path to the tees Classify executable file.

param-doc.name: omitSteps
param-doc.p: Set the preprocessing steps to omit in the form of PREPROCESS=[SPLIT-SENTENCES][,NER][,PARSE][,FIND-HEADS]
